text: Crevillente Deportivo is a Spanish football team based in Crevillent, in the autonomous community of Valencia. Founded in 1967 it plays in Tercera División – Group 6, holding home games at Estadio Municipal Enrique Miralles, which has a capacity of 3,500 spectators. ==Season to season== {| |valign="top"
